    1: import numpy as np
    2: 
    3: np.isdtype(np.float64, (np.int64, np.float64))
    4: np.isdtype(np.int64, "signed integer")
    5: 
    6: np.issubdtype("S1", np.bytes_)
    7: np.issubdtype(np.float64, np.float32)
    8: 
    9: np.ScalarType
   10: np.ScalarType[0]
   11: np.ScalarType[3]
   12: np.ScalarType[8]
   13: np.ScalarType[10]
   14: 
   15: np.typecodes["Character"]
   16: np.typecodes["Complex"]
   17: np.typecodes["All"]
